member.name: T:Strilanc.Value.May
member.summary: Utility methods for the generic May type.

member.name: M:Strilanc.Value.May.Maybe``1(``0)
member.summary: Returns a potential value containing the given value.

member.name: M:Strilanc.Value.May.Match``2(Strilanc.Value.May{``0},System.Func{``0,``1},``1)
member.summary: Matches this potential value either into a function expecting a value or against an alternative value.

member.name: M:Strilanc.Value.May.Bind``2(Strilanc.Value.May{``0},System.Func{``0,Strilanc.Value.May{``1}})
member.summary: Returns the potential result of potentially applying the given function to this potential value.

member.name: M:Strilanc.Value.May.Else``1(Strilanc.Value.May{``0},System.Func{``0})
member.summary: Returns the value contained in the given potential value, if any, or else the result of evaluating the given alternative value function.

member.name: M:Strilanc.Value.May.Unwrap``1(Strilanc.Value.May{Strilanc.Value.May{``0}})
member.summary: Flattens a doubly-potential value, with the result containing a value only if both levels contained a value.

member.name: M:Strilanc.Value.May.Else``1(Strilanc.Value.May{``0},System.Func{Strilanc.Value.May{``0}})
member.summary: Returns the value contained in the given potential value, if any, or else the result of evaluating the given alternative potential value function.

member.name: M:Strilanc.Value.May.Else``1(Strilanc.Value.May{``0},``0)
member.summary: Returns the value contained in the given potential value, if any, or else the given alternative value.

member.name: M:Strilanc.Value.May.Else``1(Strilanc.Value.May{``0},Strilanc.Value.May{``0})
member.summary: Returns the value contained in the given potential value, if any, or else the given alternative potential value.

member.name: M:Strilanc.Value.May.Select``2(Strilanc.Value.May{``0},System.Func{``0,``1})
member.summary: Returns the result of potentially applying a function to this potential value.

member.name: M:Strilanc.Value.May.Where``1(Strilanc.Value.May{``0},System.Func{``0,System.Boolean})
member.summary: Returns the same value, unless the contained value does not match the filter in which case a no value is returned.

member.name: M:Strilanc.Value.May.SelectMany``3(Strilanc.Value.May{``0},System.Func{``0,Strilanc.Value.May{``1}},System.Func{``0,``1,``2})
member.summary: Projects optional values, returning a no value if anything along the way is a no value.

member.name: M:Strilanc.Value.May.Combine``3(Strilanc.Value.May{``0},Strilanc.Value.May{``1},System.Func{``0,``1,``2})
member.summary: Combines the values contained in several potential values with a projection function, returning no value if any of the inputs contain no value.

member.name: M:Strilanc.Value.May.Combine``4(Strilanc.Value.May{``0},Strilanc.Value.May{``1},Strilanc.Value.May{``2},System.Func{``0,``1,``2,``3})
member.summary: Combines the values contained in several potential values with a projection function, returning no value if any of the inputs contain no value.

member.name: M:Strilanc.Value.May.Combine``5(Strilanc.Value.May{``0},Strilanc.Value.May{``1},Strilanc.Value.May{``2},Strilanc.Value.May{``3},System.Func{``0,``1,``2,``3,``4})
member.summary: Combines the values contained in several potential values with a projection function, returning no value if any of the inputs contain no value.

member.name: M:Strilanc.Value.May.IfHasValueThenDo``1(Strilanc.Value.May{``0},System.Action{``0})
member.summary: Potentially runs an action taking the potential value's value. No effect if the potential value is no value. Returns an IMayHaveValue that has a value iff the action was run.

member.name: M:Strilanc.Value.May.ElseDo(Strilanc.Value.IMayHaveValue,System.Action)
member.summary: Runs the given no value action if the given potential value does not contain a value, and otherwise does nothing.

member.name: M:Strilanc.Value.May.ElseDefault``1(Strilanc.Value.May{``0})
member.summary: Returns the value contained in the given potential value, if any, or else the type's default value.

member.name: M:Strilanc.Value.May.ForceGetValue``1(Strilanc.Value.May{``0})
member.summary: Returns the value contained in the potential value, or throws an InvalidOperationException if it contains no value.

member.name: P:Strilanc.Value.May.NoValue
member.summary: A potential value containing no value. Implicitely converts to a no value of any generic May type. Note: All forms of no value are equal, including May.NoValue, May<T>.NoValue, May<AnyOtherT>.NoValue, default(May<T>) and new May<T>(). Note: Null is NOT equivalent to new May<object>(null) and neither is equivalent to new May<string>(null).

member.name: T:Strilanc.Value.MayNoValue
member.summary: A non-generic lack-of-value type, equivalent to generic likes like lack-of-int. Use Strilanc.Value.May.NoValue to get an instance. Note: All forms of no value are equal, including May.NoValue, May<T>.NoValue, May<AnyOtherT>.NoValue, default(May<T>) and new May<T>(). Note: Null is NOT equivalent to new May<object>(null) and neither is equivalent to new May<string>(null).

member.name: T:Strilanc.Value.IMayHaveValue
member.summary: A potential value that may or may not contain an unknown value of unknown type. All implementations should compare equal and have a hash code of 0 when HasValue is false.
member.remarks: Used to allow comparisons of the raw May.NoValue to generic ones like May<int>.NoValue. Also used as the result type of the 'do action if value present' method, but only because there is no standard void or unit type.

member.name: P:Strilanc.Value.IMayHaveValue.HasValue
member.summary: Determines if this potential value contains a value or not.

member.name: M:Strilanc.Value.MayNoValue.GetHashCode
member.summary: Returns the hash code for a lack of potential value.

member.name: M:Strilanc.Value.MayNoValue.Equals(Strilanc.Value.IMayHaveValue)
member.summary: Determines if the given potential value contains no value.

member.name: M:Strilanc.Value.MayNoValue.Equals(System.Object)
member.summary: Determines if the given object is a potential value containing no value.

member.name: M:Strilanc.Value.MayNoValue.op_Equality(Strilanc.Value.MayNoValue,Strilanc.Value.MayNoValue)
member.summary: Determines if two lack of values are equal (they are).

member.name: M:Strilanc.Value.MayNoValue.op_Inequality(Strilanc.Value.MayNoValue,Strilanc.Value.MayNoValue)
member.summary: Determines if two lack of values are not equal (they're not).

member.name: M:Strilanc.Value.MayNoValue.ToString
member.summary: Returns a string representation of this lack of value.

member.name: P:Strilanc.Value.MayNoValue.HasValue
member.summary: Determines if this potential value contains a value or not (it doesn't).

member.name: T:Strilanc.Value.May`1
member.summary: A potential value that may contain no value or may contain a value of type T. Note: All forms of no value are equal, including May.NoValue, May<T>.NoValue, May<AnyOtherT>.NoValue, default(May<T>) and new May<T>(). Note: Null is NOT equivalent to new May<object>(null) and neither is equivalent to new May<string>(null).

member.name: M:Strilanc.Value.May`1.#ctor(`0)
member.summary: Constructs a potential value containing the given value.

member.name: M:Strilanc.Value.May`1.Match``1(System.Func{`0,``0},System.Func{``0})
member.summary: Matches this potential value into either a function expecting a value or a function expecting no value, returning the result.

member.name: M:Strilanc.Value.May`1.op_Implicit(Strilanc.Value.MayNoValue)~Strilanc.Value.May{`0}
member.summary: Returns a potential value containing no value.

member.name: M:Strilanc.Value.May`1.op_Implicit(`0)~Strilanc.Value.May{`0}
member.summary: Returns a potential value containing the given value.

member.name: M:Strilanc.Value.May`1.op_Explicit(Strilanc.Value.May{`0})~`0
member.summary: Returns the value contained in the potential value, throwing a cast exception if the potential value contains no value.

member.name: M:Strilanc.Value.May`1.op_Equality(Strilanc.Value.May{`0},Strilanc.Value.May{`0})
member.summary: Determines if two potential values are equivalent.

member.name: M:Strilanc.Value.May`1.op_Inequality(Strilanc.Value.May{`0},Strilanc.Value.May{`0})
member.summary: Determines if two potential values are not equivalent.

member.name: M:Strilanc.Value.May`1.op_Equality(Strilanc.Value.May{`0},Strilanc.Value.IMayHaveValue)
member.summary: Determines if two potential values are equivalent.

member.name: M:Strilanc.Value.May`1.op_Inequality(Strilanc.Value.May{`0},Strilanc.Value.IMayHaveValue)
member.summary: Determines if two potential values are not equivalent.

member.name: M:Strilanc.Value.May`1.GetHashCode
member.summary: Returns the hash code for this potential value.

member.name: M:Strilanc.Value.May`1.Equals(Strilanc.Value.May{`0})
member.summary: Determines if this potential value is equivalent to the given potential value. Note: All forms of no value are equal, including May.NoValue, May<T>.NoValue, May<AnyOtherT>.NoValue, default(May<T>) and new May<T>(). Note: Null is NOT equivalent to new May<object>(null) and neither is equivalent to new May<string>(null).

member.name: M:Strilanc.Value.May`1.Equals(Strilanc.Value.IMayHaveValue)
member.summary: Determines if this potential value is equivalent to the given potential value. Note: All forms of no value are equal, including May.NoValue, May<T>.NoValue, May<AnyOtherT>.NoValue, default(May<T>) and new May<T>(). Note: Null is NOT equivalent to new May<object>(null) and neither is equivalent to new May<string>(null).

member.name: M:Strilanc.Value.May`1.Equals(System.Object)
member.summary: Determines if this potential value is equivalent to the given object. Note: All forms of no value are equal, including May.NoValue, May<T>.NoValue, May<AnyOtherT>.NoValue, default(May<T>) and new May<T>(). Note: Null is NOT equivalent to new May<object>(null) and neither is equivalent to new May<string>(null).

member.name: M:Strilanc.Value.May`1.ToString
member.summary: Returns a string representation of this potential value.

member.name: P:Strilanc.Value.May`1.NoValue
member.summary: A potential value containing no value. Note: All forms of no value are equal, including May.NoValue, May<T>.NoValue, May<AnyOtherT>.NoValue, default(May<T>) and new May<T>(). Note: Null is NOT equivalent to new May<object>(null) and neither is equivalent to new May<string>(null).

member.name: P:Strilanc.Value.May`1.HasValue
member.summary: Determines if this potential value contains a value or not.

member.name: T:Strilanc.Value.MayUtilities
member.summary: Utility methods that involve May<T> but with a focus on other types.

member.name: M:Strilanc.Value.MayUtilities.AsNullable``1(Strilanc.Value.May{``0})
member.summary: Returns the value contained in the given potential value as a nullable type, returning null if there is no contained value.

member.name: M:Strilanc.Value.MayUtilities.AsMay``1(System.Nullable{``0})
member.summary: Returns the value contained in the given nullable value as a potential value, with null corresponding to no value.

member.name: M:Strilanc.Value.MayUtilities.MayAggregate``1(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{``0},System.Func{``0,``0,``0})
member.summary: Returns the result of using a folder function to combine all the items in the sequence into one aggregate item. If the sequence is empty, the result is NoValue.

member.name: M:Strilanc.Value.MayUtilities.MayMin``1(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{``0},System.Collections.Generic.IComparer{``0})
member.summary: Returns the minimum value in a sequence, as determined by the given comparer or else the type's default comparer. If the sequence is empty, the result is NoValue.

member.name: M:Strilanc.Value.MayUtilities.MayMax``1(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{``0},System.Collections.Generic.IComparer{``0})
member.summary: Returns the maximum value in a sequence, as determined by the given comparer or else the type's default comparer. If the sequence is empty, the result is NoValue.

member.name: M:Strilanc.Value.MayUtilities.MayMinBy``2(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{``0},System.Func{``0,``1},System.Collections.Generic.IComparer{``1})
member.summary: Returns the minimum value in a sequence, as determined by projecting the items and using the given comparer or else the type's default comparer. If the sequence is empty, the result is NoValue.

member.name: M:Strilanc.Value.MayUtilities.MayMaxBy``2(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{``0},System.Func{``0,``1},System.Collections.Generic.IComparer{``1})
member.summary: Returns the maximum value in a sequence, as determined by projecting the items and using the given comparer or else the type's default comparer. If the sequence is empty, the result is NoValue.

member.name: M:Strilanc.Value.MayUtilities.MayFirst``1(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{``0})
member.summary: Returns the first item in a sequence, or else NoValue if the sequence is empty.

member.name: M:Strilanc.Value.MayUtilities.MayLast``1(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{``0})
member.summary: Returns the last item in a sequence, or else NoValue if the sequence is empty.

member.name: M:Strilanc.Value.MayUtilities.MaySingle``1(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{``0})
member.summary: Returns the single item in a sequence, NoValue if the sequence is empty, or throws an exception if there is more than one item.

member.name: M:Strilanc.Value.MayUtilities.WhereHasValue``1(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{Strilanc.Value.May{``0}})
member.summary: Enumerates the values in the potential values in the sequence. The potential values that contain no value are skipped.

member.name: M:Strilanc.Value.MayUtilities.MayAll``1(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{Strilanc.Value.May{``0}})
member.summary: Enumerates the values in all the potential values in the sequence. However, if any of the potential values contains no value then the entire result is no value.
